name: GumBoy Toxic Adventure
description:
ASDW to Move
Spacebar = Jump
G = Punch
E = Dash
T = Barf
Q = Backflip
R = Stretch Arm

  Under the rotten remains of a civilization consumed by its own selfishness is a new world. This world is coming to life because of all the spoils and waste accumulated for thousands of years, reflecting its evolution. But there is still hope. Someone is manipulating a primitive race and uses them to exterminate the mutated creatures that proliferate there.

 

  Explore this toxic world with your incredible abilities and survive the creatures that want to eat you. Run, jump, stretch your body to get on different sites or to defeat enemies. Deform your body to plan or perform different actions. No problem since you're like gum. Run, lead them to areas that are more favorable to start destroying them. Explore, escape and slash in a world where you eat or are eaten.

CREDITS
Erick Clark (Graphics & Level Designer)
Oris Romero (Programmer & Shaders)
